Ontario Lakes Project: Bark Lake

14 Dec 2011
Nestled in the Kawartha highlands, Bark Lake is home to the Bark Lake Leadership Centre which starting in 1969, trained young folks who worked at summer camps or volunteered with outdoor clubs or youth groups.
You could say they were an early adopter of, now trendy, environmental education training.
The world has caught up to Bark Lake. Today the centre offers environmental leadership training to kids and adults year round.Â Here’s a taste of what they offer in their W.I.L.D training program which instructs educators on how to provide outdoor education.
